data.title: Andrew Lane
data.meta_description: Read articles and news by Andrew Lane, who is a partner with Critical Facility Search Partners, a boutique executive search and market research firm focused exclusively on the data center market since its inception in 2006.
data.text:
Mission Critical Magazine's 2015 Facility Manager Of The Year Winner

Matt Gleason of CoreSite is the inaugural Facility Manager of the Year.

Matt Gleason, general manager for Coresite's New York region, has been voted Mission Critical Magazine’s Inaugural Data Center Facility Manager of the Year for 2015.

Read More

Thoughts From IMN East 2014

I’m just leaving The Conrad Hotel in the Financial District in Manhattan, NY where I attended Information Management Network (IMN) 4th Annual Spring Forum on Financing, Investing, and Real Estate Development for Data Centers, May 28 and 29th, 2014

Read More

Thoughts From The 2014 Northern California Data Center Summit

I thought I would simply write you a letter and tell you about my visit to San Francisco for CapRate Events’ (CRE) Northern California Data Center Summit this past April.

Read More

7 X 24 Exchange International Turns 25!

The not-for-profit organization really is the fulfilment of a vi-sion

Bake a cake. Light the candles. Take pause to celebrate the fulfilment of a vision.

Read More

Scott Widham Is A Model Of Consistency

The CEO of Alpheus Communications is a straight shooter.

I had the pleasure of playing golf with Scott Widham, CEO of Alpheus Communications, at a little event we put together with Schneider Electric’s Data Center Solutions Provider business.

Read More

John Regan Of Carter Validus Is A Man On A Mission

He is bridging the gap between IT and facilities.

I met up with John Regan at IMN last year. He landed at LGA Wednesday night. As soon as his UBER hit Manhattan at 11:30 p.m., he received a note.

Read More

Catching up With DCD's Stephen Madaffari

Twenty minutes into the conversation Stephen Madaffari, principal of Data Centers Delivered and HTS New York, was done. He got it. He’d been through it in his head already.

Read More

Rationally Speaking With DataBank’s Kevin Ooley

The CFO works for balance in the data center industry.

You’ve likely noticed that organizational charts, whether flat or vertical, are triangles, narrowing at the top. If you squint and tilt your head sideways you can almost juxtapose a bell curve over the top.

Read More

A View From The Top

Bob Morse cultivates success at Oak Hill Capital Partners.

The benefit of interviewing exceptional people is that I get to borrow parts and pieces of those conversations and institutionalize them in future work. Interviewing Bob Morse of Oak Hill Capital Partners made me realize the multiplying effect of that benefit.

Read More
